import React,{createContext,useState}from'react';import'./style/App.css';import'./style/header.css';import Connexion from'./frontend/Connexion';import Inscription from'./frontend/Inscription';import Home from'./frontend/Home';import User from'./class/User';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[displayConnexion,setdisplayConnexion]=useState(true);const[user,setUser]=useState(new User());const UserContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext(undefined);// Créer un composant contextuel pour fournir l'utilisateur aux composants enfants
const UserProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserContext.Provider,{value:user,children:children});};const handleToggle=()=>{setdisplayConnexion(!displayConnexion);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserProvider,{children:user.getConnected()?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{children:[displayConnexion?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Connexion,{setUser:setUser}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Inscription,{setUser:setUser}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"connexionChange",onClick:handleToggle,children:displayConnexion?"S'inscrire":"Se connecter"})]})});};export default App;
